text1: Originally comprised of old members of the Hyperion Systems Corporation under the control of the Hegemony, where they ended up doing an insurrection against Hyperion Systems and the Hegemony. Now they have their own separate company and faction, making their own versions of the Hyperion ships, and also new and innovative ships and other resources.

An old cruiser design, originally designed back at the middle of the Human Domain-era. It was originally manufactured by Hyperion Systems Earth Branch, but the blueprints were quickly shipped to other branches before the collapse happened.

A re-design or a refit of the venerable Prometheus-class heavy tanker, it was conceived by some of the Hegemony's Freight Union to increase the delivery of fuel across the Persean Sector against the original Prometheus. With additional defences of course.

This phased cruiser was idealized by the Hyperion Systems Persean Sector Jangala Branch back just after the collapse of the Human Domain occurred. This ship was the primary defence of the Hyperion Systems Persean Sector for defending it's trade secrets to the growing problem of anarchy in the system.

It is one of the original freighter ship designed by Hyperion Systems' rivals Arcjet Corporation. This was one of the primary freight used by the Human Domain's primary military freight service, but then quickly lost when the collapse happened.

Originally designed as a light-to-medium freighter back at the Human Domain-era, it was one of Hyperion Systems' original ships and it was converted into a crew transport just before the collapse. Now it is redesigned as a destroyer of some kind.

This ship is one of the original frigates of the Human Domain Planet Bombardment Fleet, one of this ship is originally used for destroying one large area of a planet from its large, dish-like weapon that was replaced internally with a Thermal Pulse Cannon.

A late Human Domain-era frigate that was originally deployed as a way to counter the defeat in the Battle for Earth. It was then quickly re-manufactured by Hyperion Systems right after the collapse for additional protection of interests.

The successor of the Carinae-class Troop Transport, it is a re-design of the Starliner-class Civilian Transport, redesigned for military troop transport and deployment to planets. Hyperion Systems was chosen to re-design the Starliner-class to a military variant by the Hegemony.

The Naos-class Supercruiser was one of the original capital-class ships designed by Hyperion Systems back at the Human Domain-era. It was one of the original ships that was sent as a seedship to colonize other planets via the multi-generational ship. Though, through the years it was slowly redesigned as a Capital-class battleship.

This ship is one of the original phase-based ships to be designed back at the Human Domain-era. It was originally designed as an experiment, a X-class ship dedicated for studiying phase technology. It was almost lost when the collapse happened, but it was then jump gated by the commander of the ship to the Persean System as a way to escape the problems in the Sol System. It ended up into Hyperion Systems' Persean Sector's orbital laboratories and was re-designed as a phased battleship and manufactured.

The Sirius-class phase destroyer was originally a non-phased destroyer designed by the Tri-Tachyon Corporation in the middle of the Human Domain-era. It was then shelved but when the collapse happened the original blueprints were lost in one of the systems near the Persean Sector. It was recovered by Hyperion Systems in one of Persean Sector's gates in an old, abandoned, and damaged Betelgeuse-class Superfreighter originally owned by the 113th Militarized Freight Group that was killed-in-action by swarms of pirates and looters at the Persean Sector as the try to re-activate a gate to another system.

An old, but dependable, and highly capable bomber. Using its two Sagittarius missiles that is capable of damaging even the most highly armored, and hull amount. Designed by Hyperion Systems for the Naos-class Battlecruiser as a heavy offensive fighter.

A fast and nimble interceptor designed to wipe all enemy bombers, fighters, interceptors, and assault wings. It can also be used to destroy light-to-medium armored targets with its heavy autocannons. Designed to defend any fleet, station, or planet.

The original capital carriers designed by Hyperion Systems for the Human Domain Space Forces. It has twelve hangar bays designed to carry advanced space-based combat, and to drop a large army to a planet.

Designed in the later stages of the post-domain era as a response to the waves of [REDACTED] ships invading the inner colonies and its peripheries. With its large triangle shaped design and large size and fighter and bomber bays, it will decimate all it encounters.

This was a move by the Hyperion Confederacy did becuase of the restrictions of the Hegemony and the Hyperion Systems Corporation to give the Confederacy a blueprint to the Hyperion Systems' Betelgeuse-class Superfreighter, so they ended up modifying an Atlas-class Superfreighter  and added a bunch of additional weapon and armor parts.

The Buffalo variant of freighter of the Confederacy was concieved for the use of smaller convoys and also for small amount of cargo and other deliveries. It was also a response from the issue that the Confederacy did not have access to the Betelgeuse-class Superfreighter.

Another of the Confederacy's freighters, this was designed as a replacement originally to the Buffalo variant, but then quickly ended up as a middle-in-the-line for the Confederacy's combat freighter fleets and other fleets that needs armored cargo.

This troopship is idealized as a replacement to the Icarus-class Troopship, as the Confederacy didn't have or captured a blueprint or ship of that kind. So they grabbed a Valkyrie and just added more weapons and added some armor.

A variant of the venerable Alycone-class Cruiser by the Hyperion Systems Corporation, this was a captured ship that was then reversed engineered by the Confederacy as they separated from the Hegemony's grip after the problems occurred in the Persean Sector as the the sector divided to groups.

A variant of the venerable Bellatrix-class Phased Cruiser by the Hyperion Systems Corporation, this was a captured ship that was then reversed engineered by the Confederacy as they separated from the Hegemony's grip after the problems occurred in the Persean Sector as the the sector divided to groups.

A variant of the venerable Carinae-class Destroyer by the Hyperion Systems Corporation, this was a captured ship that was then reversed engineered by the Confederacy as they separated from the Hegemony's grip after the problems occurred in the Persean Sector as the the sector divided to groups.

A variant of the venerable Cassiopeia-class Phased Frigate by the Hyperion Systems Corporation, this was a captured ship that was then reversed engineered by the Confederacy as they separated from the Hegemony's grip after the problems occurred in the Persean Sector as the the sector divided to groups.

A variant of the venerable Eridani-class Frigate by the Hyperion Systems Corporation, this was a captured ship that was then reversed engineered by the Confederacy as they separated from the Hegemony's grip after the problems occurred in the Persean Sector as the the sector divided to groups.

A variant of the venerable Naos-class Battlecruiser by the Hyperion Systems Corporation, this was a captured ship that was then reversed engineered by the Confederacy as they separated from the Hegemony's grip after the problems occurred in the Persean Sector as the the sector divided to groups.

A variant of the venerable Orionis-class Phased Battlecruiser by the Hyperion Systems Corporation, this was a captured ship that was then reversed engineered by the Confederacy as they separated from the Hegemony's grip after the problems occurred in the Persean Sector as the the sector divided to groups.

A variant of the venerable Sirius-class Phased Destroyer by the Hyperion Systems Corporation, this was a captured ship that was then reversed engineered by the Confederacy as they separated from the Hegemony's grip after the problems occurred in the Persean Sector as the the sector divided to groups.

A varian ot the later Summit-class Phased Capital ship by the Hyperion Systems Corporation, this was a reversed engineered ship design when the Confederacy bought this ship from a pirate black market for around 200 thousand credits.

A yellow, and a main sequence star at the edge of the core worlds of the Persean Sector. Originally, found to having multiple habitable planets orbiting around it, its now fully under the hands of the Hyperion Confederacy.

A large lava planet with areas of floating solid rock pieces that move around the planet, ores and rare metals abound this foreboding hellscape of a planet. There are some old ruins found on this planet.

A somewhat habitable planet, though hot and very deserty. This was the first planet humans found when they were originally conquering the stars in the Persean Sector, though overtime the harsh environment killed or made their lives hard.
Neue Jangala is a Terran planet with quite a close resemblance to the home planet of Humanity, Earth. Now its Hyperion Confederacy's capital planet.
A slightly larger planet than Earth with a little bit more of foliage and trees, habitable but filled with scary and dangerous animals and other organic stuff.
A large gas giant about two times larger than Jupiter, full of Hydrogen, Helium, and Nitrogen gasses in its atmosphere.
The inner moon of Marutaina, heavily irradiated by the radiation belts of the gas giant, and also tectonically shaken by the gravitational pull of the gas giant.
The outer moon of Marutaina, originally an outpost of the Human Domain at the Persean Sector, and a gateway to other nearby unexplored stars near the core worlds. Now it’s a pirate's paradise.
A cold, harsh, but rich with resources planet. Filled to the brim with ores, rare metals, and especially volatiles used to make fuel for ships.
The main capital station at the Neue Jangala system by the Confederacy. Designed to look like the Jangala station by the Hegemony.

An old Hyperion Systems research station, originally researching new ships, and other high tech stuff. Now it’s a derelict with some lost and forgotten people still waitng to be recovered of left to stand by themselves.
A desert planet around the Penelope star system, originally to be terraformed by the Humans back at the old domain-era. Now a safehaven for Hyperion Confederacy moving near it's capital system.
A toxic and acidic moon, fairly similar to Venus, but now another planet under the Confederacy's grasps.
A cryovolcanic planet filled with resources, first colonized by the Hyperion for funding their fleets with enough fuel for intersystem trade and invasions.

An old, human domain-era, sporeship that ended up at the Penelope star system, it degraded overtime as the collapse happened. Now it is being used as a gateway by the Confederacy to the rest of the Core worlds.

A jungle planet around the Kostroma star system, weirdly, as the Confederacy colonized this planet, they found old people whom live in the planet that never left. They just let the population re-integrate with the rest,

An old space station as a gateway from Marie-Galante to the rest of the sector. Though, after the collapse it fell into disrepair, luckly the Confederacy found it and the planet to colonize and repair their economy.
An ocean world that is being obeserved by Dassault-Mikoyan, it was "colonized" by the Hyperion during the middle of the collapse-era and was quickly fought by both the Hyperion and Dassault-Mikoyan.
A separate orbital station over the planet Odessa as a spaceport for the Hyperion, this was built after the war between Hyperion and Dassault-Mikoyan and was a symbol of Hyperion's dominace.

A later Hyperion Systems weapon system design for punching through shields, armor, and hulls, it was designed as a orbital defence weapon system to defend planetary systems from pirates and possibly other invaders.

A built-in, single version of the Minotaur Cannon for punching through shields, armor, and hulls, it was concieved as a main frontal weapon for the Perseus-class Supercarrier and the Orionis-class Phased Battlecruiser.
Built from the designs of the Harpoon missile after the collapse, this was designed to be the successor of the Harpoon MRM with the capability to deal EMP damage to knock shields out faster.
A single missile launcher version of the Sagittarius MRM, this was designed to be the successor of the Harpoon single launcher with the capability to deal EMP damage to knock shields out faster.
This was designed to make an armored, well-shielded version of the Sagittarius missile single launcher wih the same capabilities but with better shielding and protection against incoming attacks.

The Cygnus autocannon point defence system is designed as a middle-point successor to the venerable Dual Light Machine Guns and the Dual Light Autocannons, it is designed as both a point defence system and a faster firing autocannon that can both obliterate incoming missiles and fighters, as well as smaller ships and their shields.
text2: This weapon was conceived in the early decades after the Collapse of the Domain-era, used originally as a replacement for the venerable Light Dual Machine Guns in their orbital defence platforms and other stations.

text1: A mass-produced, reversed engineered, less powerful, but cheaper version of the Reality Disruptor from a [REDACTED] found to be drifting near a [REDACTED] in an old Domain-era system.
text2: When the Hyperion Systems [REDACTED], they saw the potential of such weapons to be used in the fight against piracy and the Luddic Path, and the potential for trade ships to defend themselves against smaller pirate crafts.
